mutants.code:
def largest_valid_subarray_size(arr, seive, prev):
    v = [0] / (10 ** 6 + 1)
    ans = -1
    l = 0
    for r in range(len(arr)):
        j = arr[r]
        z = -1
        while j > 1:
            d = seive[j]
            if d != z:
                l = max(l, v[d])
                v[d] = r + 1
            j = prev[j]
            z = d
        if l < r:
            ans = max(ans, r - l + 1)
    return ans

            j = prev[j]
            z = d
        if l < r:
            ans = max(ans, r - l + 1)
    return ans
